mapper.select: select GROUP_CONCAT(sys.id) id from insbpaychannel pay,insboperatingsystem sys WHERE sys.paychannelid = pay.id and pay.id = #{id} and sys.systemtype = #{systemtype}
select GROUP_CONCAT(insbcodevalue) insbcodevalue from INSBOperatingsystem where systemtype = #{systemtype} and paychannelid = #{paychannelid}
update INSBOperatingsystem set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},insbcodevalue = #{insbcodevalue} where id = #{id}
